context: I really like Edgar ALlan Poe's work. I am looking for a poem by him, do you know any?
resp: I can help with them and he has written The Tell-Tale Heart, The Raven and Other Poems and The Raven to name a few of his works. There is also The Fall of the House of Usher and Other Writings.
